question: I am a Type 2 diabetic for 10 years and on Diamicron (4 tabs) and Metformin (3 tabs) medication daily. My glucose tests has dropped from range of 14-16 middle last year to range of 6-8 this year.  Latest Hb1Ac is 6.5 done 2 weeks ago.Beginning this year, I realised I have pain on right side of my body just below the rib cage.  Its like needles poking from inside my body.  When I walk I feel the tightness around the area and esp after meals, but it will go away after a while.  Now the pain is spreading to the other parts of the body on the right side.  I find difficulty even wearing my clothes as the pain is sensitive to even my clothes. I am also suffering from erectile dysfunction.I have done ultrasound test, chest x-ray for other major organs and all is ok.I went to see a neurologist who gave me gababentin to help me to sleep as suspect could be my nerves. My neuro mentioned that could be nerve regeneration and to control my diabetes.Gabapentin is costing me a lot and I am not sure how long I need to take this med.  Any other forms of help/info - like physiotherapy-  to reduce this pain is appreciated.Thank youI need some information and help. Thank you.
title: Nerve Regeneration and Diabetes
